title: it is beyond stupid that scaling is different for different champions.
body:
I don't care ... the game should have *NOTHING* to do with what champions you have.

It should *all* be about skill with each champion.

Every champion should scale exactly the same. There should be no strong early, weak late. Every champion should scale the same so that *skill,* which has NOTHING to do with champion pick, is what controls the outcome of the game.

All modes should be random champion picks, and if you don't have at least half, you get one of the free to play.

Make it work. Don't take no for an answer.
